name: Murder in Venice
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Uncover an Incredible Adventure...

Vera, a young student studying in Italy, witnesses the murder of an unknown man in Venice. Vera's curious nature and innate thirst for adventure plunges her into the middle of a twisted KGB plot that dates back to the Cold War.
  • Two interchanging timelines, covering both present day and the 1960s Cold War
  • Captivating spy story with plot twists and intrigue at every turn
